item.title: By: Greg
item.dc:creator: Greg
item.description:
Interesting. I still haven't attempted to shoot any sports really. Other than running events, I've been limited to boring shoots. I should go to some of these high school football games with the staff photogs at the newspaper, as I am freelance, and have a dummy press pass, I should be able to get with them no probs, get on the front line.
I might want to snag a 1.4x teleconverter too for this, as the 200mm doesn't always reach as far as one would like :D
item.content:encoded:
Interesting. I still haven’t attempted to shoot any sports really. Other than running events, I’ve been limited to boring shoots. item.description: [...] unknown wrote an interesting post today onHere’s a quick excerptNo matter what lens you are using shoot tight. Tight action shots give the viewer a feeling of being in the game. Canon and the NFL have teamed up to produce a video series of football shooting tips with Sports Illustrated photographer … [...]
